DataSource.Query: SELECT sales.quotations.quotation_id, account.users.name AS entered_by, sales.quotations.value_date, sales.quotations.expected_delivery_date, core.offices.office_name, sales.quotations.terms, sales.quotations.cancelled, sales.quotations.internal_memo, inventory.customers.customer_name, sales.quotations.taxable_total, sales.quotations.discount, sales.quotations.tax_rate, sales.quotations.tax, COALESCE(sales.quotations.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(sales.quotations.tax, 0) - COALESCE(sales.quotations.discount, 0) AS sub_total, sales.quotations.nontaxable_total, COALESCE(sales.quotations.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(sales.quotations.tax, 0) + COALESCE(sales.quotations.nontaxable_total, 0) - COALESCE(sales.quotations.discount, 0) AS total FROM sales.quotations INNER JOIN core.offices ON sales.quotations.office_id = core.offices.office_id INNER JOIN account.users ON sales.quotations.user_id = account.users.user_id LEFT JOIN inventory.customers ON sales.quotations.customer_id = inventory.customers.customer_id WHERE sales.quotations.quotation_id=@quotation_id;

SELECT inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, sales.quotation_details.price, sales.quotation_details.quantity, inventory.units.unit_name, ROUND(sales.quotation_details.price * sales.quotation_details.quantity, 4) AS amount, sales.quotation_details.discount, sales.quotation_details.shipping_charge, ROUND((sales.quotation_details.price * sales.quotation_details.quantity) - sales.quotation_details.discount + sales.quotation_details.shipping_charge, 4) AS total FROM sales.quotation_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON sales.quotation_details.item_id = inventory.items.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON sales.quotation_details.unit_id = inventory.units.unit_id WHERE sales.quotation_details.quotation_id = @quotation_id ORDER BY sales.quotation_details.quotation_detail_id;
